column2: Where should President Trump hold his next rally?
column5: I received this email today:  OFFICIAL SURVEY Where should President Trump hold his next rally? TAKE THE SURVEY NOW >>   As you can see these people will not give up. (my siblings put me on orange dingus’s mailing list as a joke)  But I saw an opportunity for the DK faithful.  I think this community will come up with the best responses to this burning question.   For added points it has to be somewhere Jordan Klepper will enjoy!
